title: Waring Commercial Pistol Vacuum Sealing System, 8.2 x 5 x 8.2 inches, Black
description: Heavy duty commercial vacuum sealer. The vacuum sealer is cordless and rechargeable. This heavy duty commercial sealer can seal up to 50 bags on one charge. This sealer is excellent for food storage whether for dry storage or use in the freezer. The sealer is an excellent component of your sous vide cooking system. The bags can be opened to remove or add product and then vacuum sealed again. The bags do not need to be cut open. This unit ships with 25 one-quart bags and 25 one-gallon bags.
